page.title: 18Industry and Trades.
page.content: There,s quite a lot of trade in Hartwell although its a small village. There is a postman,shop,post office, woodyard,coalyard and an egg farm. Forestry is an industry because the forest which has tourists provides jobs for people.There is a lot of jobs in our village.For example there's a bread van that comes on Wednesday and Friday. We have a local milkman who sells some milk, bread, butter, eggs,cream,yogurt etc.We have about four ice cream vans that come around the village.There is one local shop but there used to be two.Now there is bungalow on the site. The school has four dinner ladies,the head,six teachers, one auxiliary lady helper,two dinner ladies,two cooks and a secretary. Colin Beechey,11 & Daniel Cashen,10.
